00029 #ifndef _MUX_BASE_H_
00030 #define _MUX_BASE_H_
00031 
00032 #include "in1out.h"
00033 #include "queue.h"
00034 //tolua_begin
00035 class muxBase: public in1out {
00036   typedef in1out baseclass;
00037 
00038 public:
00039   muxBase(void);
00040   ~muxBase(void);
00041   int act(void);
00042   int getLoss(int i) { return this->lost[i - 1];}
00043   int getLossVCI(int i) { return this->lostVCI[i];}
00044   int getLossINPRIO(int i) { return this->lostINPRIO[i];}
00045   int getLossTot(void) { return this->lossTot;}
00046   void resLoss(void);
00047   int getNinp(void) { return this->ninp;}
00048   int getMaxVCI(void) { return this->max_vci;}
00049   int getMaxINPRIO(void) { return this->max_inprio;}
00050   void setMaxVCI(int maxvci) {this->max_vci = maxvci;}
00051   void setMaxINPRIO(int maxinprio) {this->max_inprio = maxinprio;}
00052   //tolua_end
00053   struct inpstruct {
00054     data *pdata;
00055     int inp;
00056   };
00057   rec_typ REC(data *, int); // REC is a macro normally expanding to rec (for debugging)
00058   int export(exp_typ *);
00059   void dropItem(inpstruct *);
00060   //tolua_begin
00061   int ninp;     // # of inputs
00062   int max_vci;  
00063   int max_inprio;
00064   event evtLate;  // event for the late() method (called if arrival)
00065 
00066   queue q;   // system queue, does *not* include server
00067 
00068   int needToSchedule;  // TRUE: first arrival during this time step: activate late()
00069   tim_typ serviceTime;  // length of one output time slot (in simulation time steps)
00070   //tolua_end
00071   unsigned int *lost;  /* one loss counter per input line */
00072   unsigned int *lostVCI; // loss counter per VC
00073   unsigned int *lostINPRIO; // loss counter per INPRIO
00074   unsigned lossTot; // total losses
00075   int doParseBufSiz;
00076   data *server;  // the server: contains the data item which currently is played out
00077   inpstruct *inp_buff; /* buffer for cells arriving in the early slot phase */
00078   inpstruct *inp_ptr; /* current position in inp_buff */
00079 }; //tolua_export
00080 
00081 #endif // _MUX_BASE_H_
